details.sectionContent: Club your knowledge with technical & aerobics to make it through the laser maze.
This round is a basic elimination.The participants will be given a quiz and those whoâ€™ll crack it will proceed to round 2.
In this round participants will have to complete a maze and set the mirrors to beam the laser light at the end of the circuit to make it through to the next round.This is an elimination round.
The teams will have to play the laser maze game.

Date: 21/02/2018 
Round 1: 12:00 AM to 1:00 PM (EC Department[C-101/102]) 
Round 2: 1:30 PM to 2:30 PM (EC Department[C-101/102]) 
Date:22/02/2018 

Round 3: 11:30 AM to 1:00 PM(PASSAGE BETWEEN EC&IC)
